original_text: When we arrived in Rome, the Roman officer said to Paul, ‘You may live in a house by yourself, but a soldier will guard you there.’
korean_text: 우리가 로마에 들어가니 바울에게는 자기를 지키는 한 군인과 함께 따로 있게 허락하더라

sentences.original_text: the Roman officer said to Paul
'You may live in a house by yourself
but a soldier will guard you there.'
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 거기에서 군인이 당신을 경비할 것입니다.'
